name: Sewer (Rangeon, Cnastret)
description:
Is that a duck getting chased by a spider?

What is Sewer?

Sewer is a quick paste platformer were you are in the sewer climbing cobwebsand dodging spikes to get to up to the top! But don't hesitate with your moves because a hungry spider is right behind!

Controls:

Move - W D/Left and Right arrow keys

Jump/Climb - Space key

Pause Game - ESC

R - Quick Restart

Made for MiniJam123

Sewer was created for the MiniJam123 under a 72 time hour window following the theme "Web" and the limitation "No ground".

Developers: 

Rangeon - Programmer, Music Artist, Game designer

Cnastret - Pixel Artist, Level designer, SFX arstist
